channel.title: Drain Level
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Drain Level" - Some clarity on limits

item.title: Re: Drain Level
item.content:encoded:
If by 'train it' you mean loop, then yes your Season and therefor your Drain have no real cap.

Technically computers require a hard cap for every variable so there is a limit, but the smallest it is likely to be is over 32 000 (and if you looped once a day, every day, it would take you 87 years to reach that).

item.title: Drain Level
item.content:encoded: Since drain is equal to season, is there a limit to drain, or can you train it to a theoretically infinite stage?
